original_title: Sock Ads: Judith Williamson Consumes Passionately in Southern California
overview: Judith Williamson examines consumer culture in America, from the multiplication of products and their functions to capitalismâ€™s colonization of the body. What is the meaning of freedom in modern day America? Is it the freedom to change the world or the freedom to change our socks?
title: Sock Ads: Judith Williamson Consumes Passionately in Southern California
